item.title: 专家们认为，开发一种更现代化的女性碰撞假人可以挽救车祸中女性的生命。

item.title: 联邦安全机构警告说，使用滚珠让孩子们吃甜液体的糖果与窒息有关，其中至少有一人死亡，因此不应该使用这种糖果。
item.description:
Candy treats that use roller balls to let kids eat sweet liquid have been linked to choking, including at least one death, and should not be used, a federal safety agency warned. https://t.co/L7UQrT7vKX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 新一批有影响力的人正在网上爆红--但他们实际上都不存在。认识一下人工智能创造的社交媒体明星。
item.description:

item.title: 明天，@本周美国广播公司：副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在接受 @rachelvscott 采访时驳斥了俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）关于乌克兰与周五莫斯科致命袭击有关的说法。敬请收看@ThisWeekABC。
item.description:
TOMORROW ON @ThisWeekABC: Vice President Kamala Harris rejects Russian President Vladimir Putin’s claim that Ukraine was involved in Friday’s deadly attack in Moscow in interview with @rachelvscott. See the interview TOMORROW on @ThisWeekABC. pic.twitter.com/Ya0l0ABvl3

— This Week (@ThisWeekABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据一个追踪执法人员自杀事件的非营利组织发布的报告称，在七年时间里，全国有 1200 多名公共安全人员死于自杀。
item.description:
More than 1,200 of the nation's public safety personnel died by suicide over a seven-year period, according to a report released by a nonprofit organization that tracks law enforcement suicides. https://t.co/KYpqAYyeoC

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，目前在美国买房要比租房贵得多，预计至少在未来五年内，房地产市场都将如此。

item.title: 1939 年，奥帕尔-李（Opal Lee）年仅 12 岁，当时一群种族主义白人暴徒冲进她位于得克萨斯州沃思堡的家并放火焚烧，85 年后，她正在收回他们的土地。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 本日：1998 年，《泰坦尼克号》获得 11 项奥斯卡奖，包括最佳影片、最佳导演（詹姆斯-卡梅隆）和最佳歌曲（"My Heart Will Go On"），刷新了奥斯卡纪录。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1998, “Titanic” tied an Academy Awards record by winning 11 Oscars, including best picture, director (James Cameron) and song (“My Heart Will Go On”). https://t.co/Yzbs1JD4Kv pic.twitter.com/PUaC4cS0qB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：俄罗斯总统普京首次公开谈及莫斯科音乐厅恐怖袭击事件（死亡人数升至 133 人），并承诺将对任何涉案人员实施 "报复"。
item.description:
LATEST: Russian President Putin spoke out publicly for the first time about the Moscow concert hall terror attack —where the death toll rises to 133 — promising to exact "retribution" on anyone involved in it. https://t.co/JpZedlyHhk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据俄罗斯通讯社报道，俄罗斯安全局局长通知俄罗斯总统普京，莫斯科克罗克斯市政厅恐怖袭击事件的四名枪手已在俄罗斯与乌克兰的西部边境附近全部被捕。
item.description:
The head of Russia’s FSB reportedly informed Russian President Vladimir Putin that all four gunmen from the Moscow terror attack at Crocus City Hall were arrested near Russia's western border with Ukraine, Russian news agencies reported. https://t.co/SdmJA5KKP7 pic.twitter.com/FxEBgUR2q0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 Truth Social 公司已经完成了一项并购，这可能会给他带来超过 30 亿美元的收益，但交易中的一项条款使他无法立即出售自己的股份。
item.description:
Donald Trump's Truth Social has completed a merger that could net him over $3 billion — but a provision in the deal keeps him from immediately selling his shares. https://t.co/xUBghkkg0U

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024
